Text.Page:
Okay, "hero of Valkyon," let's see what you've got.

How about bringing me the head of Tersa, the leader of the enemy necromancers? Can you do that?"Show me where to go."

I was kidding, but I like your attitude, . Seriously, though, how about you...

What? Don't look at me like that!

Fine, have it your way. Go after Tersa. They only sent one soldier, so I guess I can suffer only one casualty.

Is this really Tersa's head?

I can't believe you really beheaded the leader of the necromancers!

...Okay, I admit it. You're a better than I've ever seen. Maybe one is better than a column of Kaiator's best.

If you don't have the guts to fight Tersa, go back to Kaiator.

Take up a crafting profession! I don't care.
